get.description: Fetches and returns the claims of the authenticated user.
Check if the service is healthy

post.description: Authenticates a user with email and password, and returns a JWT token if the credentials are valid.
post.summary: Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token

post.description: Invalidates the JWT token for the user by adding it to the blacklist and removes the JWT cookie.
post.summary: Logs out a user and invalidates the JWT token

get.description: Retrieves an organization from the MongoDB database by its ID.
get.summary: Retrieves an organization by user claims

post.description: Creates a new organization in the MongoDB database.

delete.description: Deletes an organization from the MongoDB database by its ID.
delete.summary: Deletes an organization by its ID

patch.description: Updates only the provided fields of an organization

post.description: Creates a new level in the organization's semantic structure
post.summary: Adds a new level to organization

delete.description: Removes a level from organization by ID

post.description: Creates a new location in the organization's semantic structure
post.summary: Adds a new location to organization

delete.description: Removes a location from organization by ID

post.description: Creates a new team in the organization's semantic structure
post.summary: Adds a new team to organization

delete.description: Removes a team from organization by ID

get.description: Retrieves users of the current user's organization with optional search

post.description: Generates a new authentication token using the refresh token provided.

get.description: Performs a semantic search for users using text embeddings and optional filters.

parameters.description: Search query text for semantic similarity
parameters.name: q

parameters.description: Filter users by team names (can be multiple)
parameters.name: teams

parameters.description: Filter users by experience levels (can be multiple)
parameters.name: levels

parameters.description: Filter users by locations (can be multiple)
parameters.name: locations

parameters.description: Maximum number of users to return (default 5, max 20)
parameters.name: limit

200.description: Streamed search results with semantic descriptions

500.description: Internal server error during search or embedding

post.description: Creates a new user in the MongoDB database.
Invites a user from the MongoDB database by its ID.
post.summary: Invites a user by its ID

post.description: Creates a new user in the MongoDB database + create organization + tokens + sends verification email
Sends a password reset email with a secure link to the user

200.description: If the email exists, reset instructions have been sent

get.description: Accepts new password from user using a valid reset token. Redirects user to onboarding with JWT.

parameters.description: Password reset token from email link
parameters.name: token

302.description: Redirects to /onboarding with accessToken and refreshToken

400.description: Bad request / invalid token / missing password

post.description: Accepts invitation token and sets user password

get.description: Retrieves a user from the MongoDB database by its ID.

parameters.description: ID of the user to retrieve
parameters.name: id

parameters.name: id

delete.description: Deletes a user from the MongoDB database by its ID.
delete.summary: Deletes a user by its ID

patch.description: Partially updates a user in the MongoDB database by its ID.
patch.summary: Patches user fields by its ID

parameters.description: ID of the user to patch
parameters.name: id

post.description: Restores a user from the MongoDB database by its ID.

parameters.name: id
